official-title.#text: To make a supplemental appropriation for the Public Health Emergency Fund, and for other purposes.

header.#text: Exemption of the Public Health Emergency Fund from sequestration

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 255(g)(1)(A) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:255/ss:g/p:1/sp:A

text.#text:
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to any sequestration order issued under such Act
			 on or after the date of enactment of this section.
